name: df-gf
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cgf, cmpo(s0, s1, cprime, cn, csb(s2, cfv(czn, cv(s0)), cfv(c1st, co(cv(s2), csf, csn(csb(s3, cfv(cpl1, cv(s2)), csb(s4, cfv(cv1, cv(s2)), co(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)), cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, cv(s3))), cv(s4)), cfv(csg, cv(s3)), cv(s4))))))))))
comment: Define the Galois finite field of order ` p ^ n ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Dec-2014.)
